document.full_text: british olympic association (boa) chairman colin moynihan and chief executive andy hunt have been suspended from london 2012 organizing committee board meetings because of a row over funding.
document.title: boa chiefs suspended from 2012 board meetings
lines_and_colors: british olympic association (boa) chairman colin moynihan and chief executive andy hunt have been suspended from london 2012 organizing committee board meetings because of a row over funding.
